page.title: 19FARMING
page.content:
Most of the land around Ickford and Worminghall is used for farming .It is fairly flat land ,ranging from 85 metres above sea level to just below 60 metres. Because of the fairly low level some of the farmland floods at times . In our area there are 15 farms marked.Most of the farms are involved in mixed farming. In a survey we found that about one third of the fields had had wheat growing in them. One third were used for hay and silage and one third had sheep or cattle grazing.
by Adrian wardle and Tom woodham.
